Instance.description: The picker interaction to select a certain object from a subject's household inventory.
Instance.parents: ObjectPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

TunableEnum.name: inventory_subject
TunableEnum.description: Subject on which the household inventory exists.

TunableList.name: valid_tags
TunableList.description: If object defintion has any tags in the list then it is a valid object to consider for picker.
